adept.common

Class HltContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnomalousText, Argument, ArgumentTuple, Chunk, Coreference, DeceptionTheory, Dependency, DocumentEvent, DocumentEventArgument, DocumentMentalState, DocumentMentalStateArgument, DocumentRelation, DocumentRelationArgument, Entailment, Entity, EventMention, EventMentionArgument, EventText, EventTextSet, HltContentContainer, InterPausalUnit, JointRelationCoreference, LanguageIdentification, MentalStateMention, Paraphrase, RelationMention, Script, ScriptVariable, ScriptVariableBinaryConstraint, SentenceSimilarity, TemporalSpan

    public abstract class HltContent
extends Item
implements Serializable
    The Class HltContent is an abstract class that represents all the HLT content generated by DEFT algorithms. All algorithmic output types inherits from HltContent.
    See Also:
